# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS
import warnings
%matplotlib inline
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session

#Date
df["datetime"] = df["datetime"].apply(lambda x: x.replace("24:00", "00:00"))
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

source.f9de07f7:
#Shape of UFO - 1
appear = pd.DataFrame(df['shape'].value_counts().head(4)).reset_index()
ax = sns.barplot(x="index", y="shape", data=appear).set(title='How most extraterrestrial species loves to design space vehicles:')

ax = sns.barplot(x="index", y='shape', data=appear).set(title='Also patented shape of Extraterrestrial species vehicle:')
source.58ef5038:
#UFO - Most Visited Place
df['country'].value_counts().head(2).plot(kind='pie',label="USA VS CANADA")
plt.title('USA and CANADA are the best tourist spot for Extraterrestial species')
source.66bc5a20:
#UFO - Most Visited Place in US
df['city'].value_counts().head(4).plot(kind='pie')
plt.title('Top 4 places Extraterrestial species visit in USA')
source.e0e66219:
#UFO - count of visits over years
yr_plot = pd.DataFrame(df['year'].value_counts().head(10)).reset_index()
plt.scatter(x=yr_plot['index'], y=yr_plot['year'], c ="pink", linewidths = 2, marker ="s", edgecolor ="green", s = 50)
plt.title('Count of Extraterrestial species that visits earth last 10 years(acc. data)')
plt.ylabel('count')
source.4b4a5b60:
#UFO - Average time period stayed in earth in top 10 years
time_stay = df[['year','duration (seconds)']][df['duration (seconds)'] >= 20]
time_stay_sec = pd.DataFrame(time_stay.groupby('year')['duration (seconds)'].mean().tail(10))
time_stay_min = time_stay_sec['duration (seconds)']/60
plt.plot(time_stay_min)
plt.ylabel('In minutes')
plt.xlabel('year')
plt.title('Extraterrestial species VISA average time period to stay on earth between years')
source.c1879cc4:
stopwords = set(STOPWORDS)
text2 = " ".join(title for title in df.comments)
word_cloud2 = WordCloud(collocations = False, stopwords = stopwords,background_color = 'white').generate(text2)
plt.imshow(word_cloud2, interpolation='bilinear')
plt.axis("off")
plt.title('Human species first words on seeing Extra Terrestial species')
plt.show()
